package.name: Tunnel of Light
package.shortDescription: This is Tunnel of Light Wallpaper for both HS and LS!

descriptionlist.description: This is Tunnel of Light Wallpaper for both HS and LS!
It's available for both HS and LS!
Make sure to move around a bit so the WP will fit to screen.

screenshot.description: This is how it'll look like.
